zh-cn: 台湾总督府农林专门学校
台湾总督府高等农林学校
台湾总督府台北高等农林学校
台北帝国大学附属农林专门部
台湾总督府台中高等农林学校
台湾总督府台中农林专门学校
台湾省立台中农业专科学校

description.zh-cn: 位于台湾台中市南区的国立研究型综合大学，起源于1919年日治时期创办的台湾总督府农林专门学校。该校以农业科学、兽医学及生命科学等领域见长。
description.en: A national research university located in the South District of Taichung, Taiwan. It originated from the Agricultural and Forestry Vocational School of the Governor-General of Taiwan, founded in 1919 during the Japanese rule period. The university is renowned for its strengths in agricultural science, veterinary medicine, and life sciences.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的最高统治机关，创办了国立中兴大学的前身“台湾总督府农林专门学校”。
description.en: The highest ruling body in Taiwan during the period of Japanese rule, which founded the 'Agricultural and Forestry Vocational School of the Governor-General of Taiwan,' the predecessor of National Chung Hsing University.

description.zh-cn: 日治时期台湾的最高学府，国立台湾大学的前身。国立中兴大学的前身曾为其附属农林专门部。
description.en: The highest institution of learning in Taiwan during the Japanese rule period, and the predecessor of National Taiwan University. The predecessor of National Chung Hsing University was once its affiliated Agriculture and Forestry Department.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的中央二级行政机关，主管教育、文化和体育等事务。
description.en: The central second-level administrative agency of the Republic of China, responsible for education, culture, sports, and other affairs.

description.zh-cn: 国立台北大学的前身之一，曾于1961年与台湾省立农学院合并组成台湾省立中兴大学。
description.en: One of the predecessors of National Taipei University, which merged with the Taiwan Provincial College of Agriculture in 1961 to form the Taiwan Provincial Chung Hsing University.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的国立大学，其前身为国立中兴大学法商学院。
description.en: A national university in Taiwan, its predecessor was the College of Law and Business of National Chung Hsing University.

nodes.id: 国立中兴大学附属高级中学

zh-cn: 国立中兴大学附属高级中学
en: The Affiliated Senior High School of National Chung Hsing University

description.zh-cn: 原为国立大里高级中学，于2014年2月1日改隶国立中兴大学。
description.en: Formerly National Dali Senior High School, it became affiliated with National Chung Hsing University on February 1, 2014.

nodes.id: 国立中兴大学附属台中高级农业职业学校

zh-cn: 国立中兴大学附属台中高级农业职业学校
en: The Affiliated Taichung Agricultural Senior High School of National Chung Hsing University

description.zh-cn: 原为国立台中高级农业职业学校，于2014年2月1日改隶国立中兴大学。
description.en: Formerly National Taichung Agricultural Senior High School, it became affiliated with National Chung Hsing University on February 1, 2014.

nodes.id: 国立中兴大学南投分部

zh-cn: 国立中兴大学南投分部
国立中兴大学中兴新村校区
en: National Chung Hsing University Nantou Campus

description.zh-cn: 国立中兴大学位于南投中兴新村的分校区。
description.en: The branch campus of National Chung Hsing University located in Zhongxing New Village, Nantou.

description.zh-cn: 国立中兴大学现任校长。
description.en: Current president of National Chung Hsing University.

description.zh-cn: 台湾省立中兴大学首任校长，中央研究院院士。
description.en: The first president of Taiwan Provincial Chung Hsing University and an academician of Academia Sinica.

description.zh-cn: 省立中兴大学第二任校长。
description.en: The second president of Provincial Chung Hsing University.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一个大学联盟系统，旨在整合国立大学资源，国立中兴大学为其成员之一。
description.en: A university alliance system in Taiwan aimed at integrating resources of national universities. National Chung Hsing University is one of its members.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的一个大学联盟系统，国立中兴大学为其成员之一。
description.en: A university alliance system in Taiwan, of which National Chung Hsing University is a member.

zh-cn: 发展国际一流大学及顶尖研究中心计划

description.zh-cn: 台湾教育部于2005年启动的一项高等教育计划，旨在提升顶尖大学的国际竞争力。
description.en: A higher education project launched by the Ministry of Education of Taiwan in 2005, aimed at enhancing the international competitiveness of top universities.

description.zh-cn: 台湾顶尖的国立综合大学之一，与国立中兴大学等校共同参与“正兴城湾杯”校际竞赛。
description.en: One of Taiwan's top national comprehensive universities, participating in the 'Jheng-Sing-Cheng-Wan Cup' intercollegiate competition with National Chung Hsing University and other institutions.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的国立大学，与国立中兴大学等校共同参与“正兴城湾杯”校际竞赛。
description.en: A national university in Taiwan that participates in the 'Jheng-Sing-Cheng-Wan Cup' intercollegiate competition with National Chung Hsing University and other institutions.

description.zh-cn: 台湾的国立综合大学，与国立中兴大学等校共同参与“正兴城湾杯”校际竞赛。
description.en: A national comprehensive university in Taiwan that participates in the 'Jheng-Sing-Cheng-Wan Cup' intercollegiate competition with National Chung Hsing University and other institutions.

description.zh-cn: 台湾总督府于1919年创办了“台湾总督府农林专门学校”，即国立中兴大学的前身。
description.en: The Governor-General of Taiwan founded the 'Agricultural and Forestry Vocational School of the Governor-General of Taiwan' in 1919, which is the predecessor of National Chung Hsing University.

description.zh-cn: 在此期间，国立中兴大学的前身被并入台北帝国大学，并更名为“台北帝国大学附属农林专门部”。
description.en: During this period, the predecessor of National Chung Hsing University was incorporated into Taihoku Imperial University and renamed the 'Affiliated Department of Agriculture and Forestry of Taihoku Imperial University'.

description.zh-cn: 自1971年起由台湾省立改隶教育部，正式成为“国立中兴大学”。
description.en: Since 1971, it was transferred from Taiwan Provincial to the Ministry of Education, officially becoming 'National Chung Hsing University'.

description.zh-cn: 台湾省立法商学院于1961年与台湾省立农学院合并为台湾省立中兴大学，成为其法商学院，直到2000年独立改制为国立台北大学。
description.en: The Taiwan Provincial College of Law and Commerce merged with the Taiwan Provincial College of Agriculture in 1961 to form the Taiwan Provincial Chung Hsing University, becoming its College of Law and Commerce, until it was independently restructured into National Taipei University in 2000.

description.zh-cn: 国立中兴大学法商学院于2000年改制为国立台北大学。
description.en: The College of Law and Business of National Chung Hsing University was restructured into National Taipei University in 2000.

description.zh-cn: 詹富智自2023年8月1日起担任国立中兴大学第十三任校长。
description.en: Chan Fuh-Jyh has served as the 13th president of National Chung Hsing University since August 1, 2023.

description.zh-cn: 林致平担任台湾省立中兴大学首任校长。
description.en: Lin Chih-Ping served as the first president of Taiwan Provincial Chung Hsing University.

description.zh-cn: 汤惠荪担任台湾省立中兴大学第二任校长。
description.en: Tang Hui-Sun served as the second president of Taiwan Provincial Chung Hsing University.

relationships.target: 国立中兴大学南投分部

description.zh-cn: 国立中兴大学于2020年10月7日成立“国立中兴大学中兴新村校区筹备处”，规划设立南投分部。
description.en: National Chung Hsing University established the 'Preparatory Office for the Zhongxing New Village Campus of National Chung Hsing University' on October 7, 2020, to plan for the establishment of the Nantou Campus.

relationships.source: 国立中兴大学附属高级中学

description.zh-cn: 原国立大里高级中学于2014年2月1日合并入国立中兴大学，并改制为其附属高级中学。
description.en: The former National Dali Senior High School was merged into National Chung Hsing University on February 1, 2014, and was restructured as its affiliated senior high school.

relationships.source: 国立中兴大学附属台中高级农业职业学校

description.zh-cn: 国立台中高级农业职业学校于2014年2月1日合并入国立中兴大学，并改制为其附属农业学校。
description.en: National Taichung Agricultural Senior High School was merged into National Chung Hsing University on February 1, 2014, and was restructured as its affiliated agricultural school.

description.zh-cn: 国立中兴大学于2021年11月8日加入“台湾国立大学系统”（NUST）。
description.en: National Chung Hsing University joined the National University System of Taiwan (NUST) on November 8, 2021.

description.zh-cn: 国立中兴大学是台湾综合大学系统的成员之一。
description.en: National Chung Hsing University is a member of the Taiwan Comprehensive University System.

description.zh-cn: 国立中兴大学于2005年入选教育部“发展国际一流大学及顶尖研究中心计划”（五年五百亿），获得经费补助以提升国际竞争力。
description.en: In 2005, National Chung Hsing University was selected for the Ministry of Education's 'Development Plan for World-Class Universities and Top-Tier Research Centers' (Five-Year 50 Billion Project), receiving funding to enhance its international competitiveness.

description.zh-cn: 自2009年起，国立中兴大学加入由国立成功大学和国立中山大学发起的“城湾杯”校际竞赛，该竞赛后更名为“兴城湾杯”，并发展为“正兴城湾杯”。
description.en: Since 2009, National Chung Hsing University has joined the 'Cheng-Wan Cup' intercollegiate competition initiated by National Cheng Kung University and National Sun Yat-sen University, which was later renamed the 'Hsing-Cheng-Wan Cup' and evolved into the 'Jheng-Sing-Cheng-Wan Cup'.

description.zh-cn: 自2009年起，国立中兴大学加入由国立成功大学和国立中山大学发起的“城湾杯”校际竞赛，该竞赛后更名为“兴城湾杯”，并发展为“正兴城湾杯”。
description.en: Since 2009, National Chung Hsing University has joined the 'Cheng-Wan Cup' intercollegiate competition initiated by National Cheng Kung University and National Sun Yat-sen University, which was later renamed the 'Hsing-Cheng-Wan Cup' and evolved into the 'Jheng-Sing-Cheng-Wan Cup'.

description.zh-cn: 自2011年起，国立中兴大学与国立中正大学等校共同参与“正兴城湾杯”校际竞赛。
description.en: Since 2011, National Chung Hsing University, along with National Chung Cheng University and other institutions, has participated in the 'Jheng-Sing-Cheng-Wan Cup' intercollegiate competition.
